MATCHES_COMPARATOR

private static final java.util.Comparator<org.json.JSONObject> MATCHES_COMPARATOR
This comparator is used to order collections of JSON objects. The property values for the #MATCH_TEXT_STRING is used to compare the JSON objects

getTextMatches

private org.json.JSONObject getTextMatches()
                                    throws org.json.JSONException,
                                           java.sql.SQLException
This method arranges the user defined options and invokes the OBDQuery.getAutocompletionsForSearchTerm(String, Map) method to find label (default), synonym and definition (optional) matches for the search string.

Returns:
JSON object to be sent to the UI
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.sql.SQLException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
org.json.JSONException

sortJsonObjects

private java.util.List<org.json.JSONObject> sortJsonObjects(java.util.Set<org.json.JSONObject> matchObjs,
                                                            java.lang.String term)
                                                     throws org.json.JSONException
PURPOSE This method uses the MATCHES_COMPARATOR to sort the input set of JSON Objects in such a way that: + objects containing labels and synonyms, which start with the search term are sorted first + objects containing labels and synonyms, which contain the search term are sorted second + objects containing definitions containing the search term are sorted third

Parameters:
matchObjs - - the set of JSON objects to be sorted
term - - the search term, which is to be used in the sorting process
Returns:
- properly sorted list of JSON Objects
Throws:
org.json.JSONException
